info.header: RSHLR013 - Average number of subscriber in HLR
info.csv_title: Average number of subscriber in HLR
info.help_text:
This report shows the average number of provisioned subscribers in the HLR(including the subscribers in unknown VLR).
Send Routing Information (SRI)report

Measurements:
M84: HLR measurement Registered subscribers per VLR
info.report-description: Average number of subscriber in HLR
info.report-title: Average number of subscriber in HLR
